ValidationRule.description: Certain reps can't submit certain case types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'Metrics That Matter'), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Manager')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Admin')), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Admin')), ISNEW())
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please see your manager to submit a request.
